notes.text:
This update for libxml2 fixes an issue when processing external entities introduced
with the fix for CVE-2014-0191.
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4

notes.text: The xmlParserHandlePEReference function in parser.c in libxml2 before 2.9.2, as used in Web Listener in Oracle HTTP Server in Oracle Fusion Middleware 11.1.1.7.0, 12.1.2.0, and 12.1.3.0 and other products, loads external parameter entities regardless of whether entity substitution or validation is enabled, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (resource consumption) via a crafted XML document.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
